org.apache.ignite.osgi

Class IgniteOsgiUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.osgi.IgniteOsgiUtils

  • public class IgniteOsgiUtils
extends Object
    Helper class for OSGi.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static Map<Ignite,ClassLoader> classloaders()
      Returns a Map of Ignite instances and the classloaders of the Bundles they were started from.
      static int gridCount()
      Returns the number of grids currently running in this OSGi container.
      static boolean isOsgi()
      Returns whether we are running in an OSGi environment.
